column1: Treatment is important to reduce complications.

In more serious reactions the person may receive: - Blood and urine tests - Breathing support, including oxygen - Chest x-ray - EKG (electrocardiogram, or heart tracing) - Intravenous fluids (through a vein) - Medicines to treat symptoms The brown recluse spider bite can leave a large sore in the skin and ugly scarring.
Death from brown recluse spider bites is more common in children than adults.
